name: html2pdf
description: Splits the selected piece of html into pages, prepared for printing, and provides a preview in the browser. Optional to add frontpage and footers.
author: mettta

scripts.version: node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('./src/version.js', 'export const VERSION = \'' + require('./package.json').version + '\';\n')" && git add src/version.js
